name: The Scrap
description:
The Scrap is an independent third-person shooter that takes place in a futuristic world inhabited by robots.



Meet B9-X, a robot from the scrapyard who turns out to be the only hope in the fight against aggressive aliens.

Constant struggle

Defeat dozens of dangerous opponents.


Dynamic gameplay

Jump into the action, use futuristic weapons, move agilely, and deliver melee attacks.


Various covers

Use covers to avoid getting hit.
